title: Jaryuu Tensei: Isekai Ittemo Ore wa Ore
original_name: 邪竜転生 ～異世界行っても俺は俺～
sinopse: The story is about a guy who died due to a car crash because of a young couple making out (what bad luck!) And he was reincarnated into a fantasy world—but as a dragon! An extremely funny and powerful one! Let's see how our unlucky main character lives as a badass dragon!?
